item.description:
Our October speaker will be product development and innovation expert Louis Foreman, who is the creator and executive producer of the Emmy Award winning PBS show Everyday Edisons. Louis is also the CEO of Edison Nation, publisher of Inventors Digest magazine, founder and chief executive of the integrated product design and engineering firm Enventys, creator of five successful startups, and holder of nine US Patents. His firm is responsible for the development and filing of 150 more.

Arrive as early as 6:30 to network with others. The meeting starts promptly at 7:00. A map of MIT showing the meeting location is at http://whereis.mit.ed.... Street parking is suggested on Ames Street, Vassar Street or Memorial Drive. Most MIT buildings have easy access and are interconnected.
item.name: Inventors Association of New England October Meetup
